ceo_buyer.justification: This announcement is authorised for release by Managing Director, Frazer Tabeart.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states Alma can earn up to a 70% interest in the Briggs project: 'Exploration at Briggs is being funded by Alma under an Earn-In Joint Venture (JV) agreement where Alma currently has a 30% JV interest and can earn up to a 70% interest from owner Canterbury Resources Limited (ASX: CBY) via a staged earn-in.'

currency.justification: The currency is inferred to be AUD as the acquiring company, Alma Metals Limited, is listed on the Australian Securities Exchange: 'Alma Metals Limited (ASX: ALM, “the Company” or “Alma”)'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The document does not mention any cash payments as part of the earn-in joint venture with Canterbury Resources. The transaction is based on exploration expenditure.

share_payments_raw.justification: The document does not mention any share payments as part of the earn-in joint venture.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The document does not mention a combined cash and share payment for the earn-in joint venture.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The document does not mention any shares being issued as part of the earn-in joint venture.

issued_share_price.justification: The document does not mention a price for any issued shares.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The document describes a drilling program but does not specify a total meterage commitment for the earn-in agreement.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document states that the earn-in is based on expenditure, but does not specify the total dollar amount required. It only notes that the current program will satisfy Stage 2 requirements: 'Completion of the current drilling program will meet the expenditure requirements to complete Stage 2 of the Earn-In...'

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Alma can earn up to a 70% interest from owner Canterbury Resources Limited via a staged earn-in by funding exploration.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Exploration at Briggs is being funded by Alma under an Earn-In Joint Venture (JV) agreement where Alma currently has a 30% JV interest and can earn up to a 70% interest from owner Canterbury Resources Limited (ASX: CBY) via a staged earn-in.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The document does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document mentions the addition of three EPMs and a portfolio of six EPMs for the Briggs project, but does not provide a specific area measurement in hectares or square kilometers.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The document mentions the addition of three EPMs and a portfolio of six EPMs for the Briggs project, but does not provide a specific area measurement in hectares or square kilometers.

resource_size.justification: The document states that 'over one million tonnes of contained copper has been defined in Inferred resources (415Mt @ 0.25% Cu and 31pm Mo, ASX release 6 July 2023).'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated in the text: 'Alma Metals Limited (ASX: ALM, “the Company” or “Alma”)'.
